bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with pian ku 偏枯 , unilateral withering. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry fu she 腹蛇： 有患大風及諸惡風，惡瘡瘰癧，皮膚頑痹，半身枯死，皮膚手足臟腑間 重疾，並主之 , “If someone suffers from massive wind and all types of malign wind, malign sores and scrofula with pervasion-illness, stubborn skin blockage, unilateral withering and necrosis , [that is,] any serious disease in the region of skin, hands and feet, and depots and palaces, it will master these all alike”.
